title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available in Navigator
description: When selecting both P1 and P2, the option to Open/Close project in the Navigator is not always available. This issue is observed in the 1GFKW5S project.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option in the Navigator is not always available.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, either both options for Open/Close project should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Navigator. 2. Select both P1 and P2. 3. Observe the availability of the Open/Close project option in the Navigator.
